name: Fintool
headline: Financial copilot for institutional investors
description: Fintool.com is a financial copilot for institutional investors. It’s ChatGPT on top of financial documents. Fintool is engineered to discover financial insights that are beyond the reach of human analysis or search software.

Comprehensive suite of AI-powered tools designed for modern fundamental research
Request Demo

## Trusted by Investment Professionals
See how leading investors and analysts use Fintool
Request Demo
![Kyle Mowery](https://www.fintool.com/_next/image?url=%2Fcustomerfaces%2Fkyle_mowery.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)
Customer Story
> Prior to using Fintool, integrating AI into our investment process was cumbersome and largely limited to industry analysis. With Fintool, we now seamlessly harness AI into our daily investment process easily for individual company research.
Kyle Mowery
Managing Partner at GrizzlyRock Capital
![Andrew Walker](https://www.fintool.com/_next/image?url=%2Fcustomerfaces%2Fandrew_walker.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)
Customer Story
> Previously, analyzing merger synergies would have been a half-day project, needing to pull up every earnings call for the past five years. With Fintool, it only takes two seconds - I just ask what companies said about their deal synergies.
Andrew Walker
Portfolio Manager at Rangeley Capital
![Abdullah Al Rezwan, CFA](https://www.fintool.com/_next/image?url=%2Fcustomerfaces%2Fabdullah.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)
Customer Story
> Fintool allows me to do a deeper research on businesses and their competitors when I try to dig into key thesis points. It's easy to go direct to the source quotes and be confident about the accuracy of Fintool!
Abdullah Al Rezwan, CFA
Author, Mostly Borrowed Ideas, 137.5K Subscribers

## Fintool is the best Financial LLM
FinanceBench is the industry standard for LLM performance on financial questions. Fintool was benchmarked against two state-of-the-art applications and models and outperfoms the leading one by 65%.
[Read the study](https://www.fintool.com/</benchmark>)
FintoolChatGPT-4o + searchGPT-4o0%25%50%75%100%
Source: FinanceBench, the benchmark for financial LLM questions
## Best Financial LLM Technology
Our enterprise-grade infrastructure processes SEC filings, earnings calls, and private documents in real-time while routing questions to the optimal LLM for guaranteed accuracy.
Request Demo

generated_description:
**Fintool: Your Financial Copilot**

Founded in 2023 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, Fintool is stepping into the financial technology landscape as a unique player specifically designed for institutional investors. Their mission? To serve as a financial copilot, leveraging advanced AI to uncover insights that traditional human analysis—or even typical search tools—might miss.

### What Is Fintool?

Originally launched as Fintool.com, the platform integrates a powerful AI model akin to ChatGPT, tailored for analyzing financial documents. This allows users to efficiently sift through extensive data—from SEC filings to earnings calls—to derive actionable insights. Fintool is part of Y Combinator's Batch W23 and boasts a compact team of six savvy individuals, led by Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne.

### Key Offerings

Fintool is not just a one-trick pony. The company has developed a suite of products tailored to modern financial analysis needs, including:

1. **Chat Assistant** - Engage in dynamic conversations to clarify complex financial queries.
2. **Equity Research** - Access detailed analyses and reports on various companies, including key metrics and financial health.
3. **Feed** - A continuous stream of real-time financial data to keep users informed.
4. **Company Screener** - Quickly identify companies based on specific criteria and trends.
5. **Docs** - Easily retrieve and analyze essential financial documents.
6. **LLM API** - For developers wanting to leverage Fintool’s capabilities in their own applications.

### Achievements in Research

Among its many features, Fintool enables users to dive deep into equity research. They provide comprehensive reports on major corporations like Costco, Microsoft, and Tesla, and summarize earnings reports with remarkable clarity. You can explore trends with studies like "Customer Concentration 2025" and "Founder-Led Companies 2025."

### Tech Powers Behind Fintool

What sets Fintool apart is its underlying technology. The platform boasts enterprise-grade infrastructure capable of processing vast amounts of data—from SEC filings to earnings calls—efficiently and accurately. It has been benchmarked against leading applications, outperforming many of them by a significant margin, demonstrating its position as a top-notch financial LLM (Language Model).

### Trusted by Professionals

Fintool emphasizes its reliability by showcasing testimonials from industry professionals. Users like Kyle Mowery, Managing Partner at GrizzlyRock Capital, highlight how Fintool simplifies the integration of AI into their investment processes, while Andrew Walker, a Portfolio Manager, notes how the platform drastically cuts down the time needed for analyzing merger synergies.

### Ready for Transformation?

Fintool is ready to empower investment firms by offering unique insights and efficient analysis. If you're in the institutional investment space and want to keep your edge sharp, exploring Fintool could be a decisive step.

You can check them out at their [website](https://www.fintool.com/)!

---

In this age, where being data-driven is paramount, Fintool's approach is both timely and innovative. They’re not just another tool; they're a partner in navigating the increasingly complex financial landscape.
